string.value: Is #b#p2091002##k done with #t2022142#? I better go ask him.

I finally received #b#t4031553##k from #p2091002#. Yuck... it smells DISGUSTING. For #p2091001# to heat this up and drink it... wow, that's amazing. Anyway, I better give this to #b#p2091001##k immediately.
I gave #p2091001# #t2022142#, which smells so bad that a mere sniffing can certainly wake up an average person.

Hey, weren't you here last time to check up on your eyes? No? Well, you could have just said no, instead of being angry at this old man. What are you here for, then? Ah, you're here to take the #b#t4031553##k. Here, would you like to take it right now?
#b#p2091001##k must be really hurting for him to ask for it. Please take #p2091001# to him immediately. Also please tell him I said hello.
Hmmm... if you don't take it right now, #p2091001# may well be angered by it. He may not look the part, but you do not want to cross his path when he is in rage.

Oh, you brought #t4031553#. That's comforting to know. I was beginning to tire of looking at the chess board. Thank you very much. I should heat this up right now. As for you, please have some #t2022142# as my way of saying thank you. It should really clear your head, and it may come in handy for you down the road.
It looks like you're still lacking some training. A true Master does not suffer from migraines. You need more meditation...
You still haven't gone to #b#p2091001##k, yet? I'll be waiting here, so go on.
Is #b#t4031553##k still not made? That's interesting... I know for a fact that #b#p2091002##k isn't THAT slow...

Hmmm? You lost #b#t4031553##k? That's not good... I am sure no one took it because it doesn't smell very good... good thing I made some extras here. Take one, and please give it to #b#p2091001##k immediately.
